name: Web-essentials
tagline: notes: Web essentials technologies HTML5 CSS3 JAVASCRIPT AJAX
body:
### Welcome to Web essentials.
This is a live document and notes for technologies used in programming web applications. The web essentials is a combined mixture of html5, css3,javascript technologies which are the fundamentals of web.
### HTML5
The HTML5 is a web standard now a days. We use it for developing web applications,websites, one page applications.
### CSS3
we will learn css3 along with some of its development frameworks. CSS3 is a web technology to add look and feel to a web application. twitter bootstrap is a CSS Framework to produce a web application in minimum ammount of time.we will go starting from beginner to pro level.
### JavaScript,Angular.js
<!--You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributorâ€™s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.-->

### phython,php
we will also learn some scripting technologies. like python and php. We will develop the applications from them.
###impression.js, GIT
We are going to learn new web technologies for regular day use.
